reuters.title: CO-OPERATIVE <COBK.O> COMPLETES ACQUISITION
reuters.body: Co-operative Bancorp said it completed the acquisition of all the issued and outstanding stock of the Quincy Co-operative Bank <QBCK.O>. Under the agreement, Quincy stockholders will receive 30 dlrs cash for each share owned of the Quincy Co-operative Bank, for a total transaction of approximately 50 mln dlrs, Co-operative said. Reuter 
